pages.title: Inertial Stability Alloy
pages.text: Probably the Architects' most elegant invention. A metal that resists any change in its state of motion, meaning nothing can push it, pull it, or break it by force alone.$(br2)It's the key ingredient in the $(l:alientech:machines/pyramid_core)Pyramid Core$() and several other advanced recipes. Without it, the energy feedback would rip any structure apart.

pages.title: How to Craft
pages.text: This alloy can $(bold)only$() be crafted in the $(l:alientech:machines/primal_catalyst)Primal Catalyst$(). Place one of each in the 3 input slots:$(br2)$(li)$(item)Concentrated Substrate$()$(li)$(item)Neutrion Ingot$()$(li)$(item)Graviton$()$(br2)The Catalyst will process them automatically.$(br2)$(warn)There is no crafting table recipe for this item.$()

pages.title: Bedrock Synthesis
pages.text: Fill an entire crafting table with 9 of these alloys to create the unbreakable: pure $(item)Bedrock$().
